body_html: Oops, I just realize you must have wanted the RNG state before the bug occurs so that you could regenerate the uniform samples that trigger the problem. What I posted was the RNG state after the bug occurred -sorry, I misunderstood. I'm not at my desk now to re-capture that data, but hopefully the test case I posted and the uniform sample value is enough to analyze / reproduce this.

body: Oops, I just realize you must have wanted the RNG state *before* the bug occurs so that you could regenerate the uniform samples that trigger the problem. What I posted was the RNG state after the bug occurred -sorry, I misunderstood. I'm not at my desk now to re-capture that data, but hopefully the test case I posted and the uniform sample value is enough to analyze / reproduce this.
